name: Disgraced
description: Corrosive Studios is proud to introduce Disgraced! A unique, alternate history role playing game. Disgraced allows players to lead a rebellion in a fight for freedom in occupied Feudal Japan.
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft Windows (32-bit/64-bit) Processor: Intel Dual-Core 2.4 GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9.0 Compatible DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: DirectSound Compatible

reviews.review_text: As cringeworthy as this game was (and it was indeed cringeworthy).. I actually had fun.
